name: JellScape
description:
JellScape is a pathfinding strategy game where you must slide through a potentially dangerous environment.

 The Goal of the game is to reach the other side without losing all of your jellys! Bombs are randomly placed under tiles each level and when you step on one it will reveal the surrounding 4 tiles near it, so fail to clear more of the path! Beat all 5 Stages and you win!

- We made the game in 2 days and all the assets/code/animations were hand made - so sorry for some of the rough edges!

- BUGS

-upcoming jellys isn't accurate
